Question: This person was later named to the 2013 Pro Bowl, his twelveth.
Hints: The ____ brothers Peyton and Eli have played against each other a few times in their professional careers.
This person, along with his brother Eli, volunteered their assistance in the wake of Hurricane Katrina.
This person completed 29 of 34 passes (85.7%) for 364 yards and 3 TDs.
